format.type: <Two formats are supported: TextFormat, AvroFormat. If the type is 'TextFormat', you can specify the following properties. The type 'Avro' does not require any additional properties>
format.columnDelimiter: <The character used as a column separator in a file. This property is optional. The default value is comma (,)>
format.rowDelimiter:
<The character used as a row separator in a file. This property is optional. The default value is any of the following: (” 
”)>
format.EscapeChar: <The character used to escape any special character in the blob content. This property is optional. No default value>
format.NullValue: <The character used to represent null value in the blob content. This property is optional. The default value is “N”>

compression.type: <The compression codec. Supported types: GZIP, Deflate, BZIP2>
compression.level: <The compression ratio. Supported levels: Optimal, Fastest>
